author: vsiveton
msg: MNG-722: Applied changes proposed by Incze Lajos, ie using OutputStreamWriter(FileOutputStream(...), outputEncoding) instead of FileWriter(...). Added also the outputEncoding parameter in the default-site.xml.

author: ekoneil
msg: Move the WSM drt/ directory to test/ so it's consistently named with the rest of Beehive.

author: ekoneil
msg: Rename jsr181.jar to beehive-jsr181.jar to follow a naming convention of namespacing specification implementations into our project name.  This is similar to what Geronimo does with the EJB / JMS / etc specs.
This is an empty revision for padding.
